name: Galaxy Shooter (ANDROID)
description:
Description

Galaxy Shooter is now playable on Android!

Shoot spaceships for 10 points, asteroids for 25 points

Player has 3 lives

Powerups can give you useful boosts!

Controls

Touch-controls for movement and shooting

Credits 

Developed by Dan Elms

Assets provided by GameDevHQ - find their courses on Udemy!
